attributes.action: The truth behind meat production factory's
attributes.additional_details: Basically I have recently seen a video called 'from farm to fridge' it shows the truth behind meat production factories. The animals there have no rights or freedom. They get tortured from as young as a day old. The have horrendous pain dealt to them. I need your help to stop this. We need these factories closed down.  For more Information on what really goes on watch the from farm to fridge video. Please take your time to sign and stop this for once. No living creature should go through this pain! #stopanimaltorture thank you for your help.
